item.title: CPU Emulator
item.description: Capable of powering 32 physical and unlimited virtual CPU components, and creating a network-based 8 or 16 bit CPU. Using a combination of custom PCBs and breadboards as well as the Emulator, you can create your own custom CPU right on your desk. The emulator supports up to 32 hardware components that interface with a Particle microcontroller over a custom PCB. Components can be built by hand on a breadboard, or made on custom PCBs.
